      Registers a new spare part in the system with the information received
      Specified by:
      add in interface SparePartCrudService
      Returns:
      Throws:
      BusinessException - in case of: - there is another spare part registered with the same code - the code or description are null or empty - any of the price, stock, min stock or max stock is negative

    • delete

      public void delete​(java.lang.String code) throws BusinessException
      Description copied from interface: SparePartCrudService
      Removes the spare part from the system if the spare part has not been used under any of its associations
      Specified by:
      delete in interface SparePartCrudService
      Throws:
      BusinessException - if case of: - there is no spare part with such code - the spare part has supplies - the spare part is involved in any order - the spare part has substitutions

    • update

      public void update​(SparePartCrudService.SparePartDto dto) throws BusinessException
      Description copied from interface: SparePartCrudService
      Updates the fields of the spare part identified by code (or id) except code, id. Version will be internally updated. The new values has to pass the same validation rules as for the add operation.
      Specified by:
      update in interface SparePartCrudService
      Throws:
      BusinessException - in case of: - the spare part code does not exist - any of id or description is null or empty - any of stock, min stock or max stock is negative - the price is negative - the version field of the incoming dto does not match the version of the persistent entity
